description: You are given an m x n matrix board, representing the current state of a crossword puzzle. The crossword contains lowercase English letters (from solved words), ' ' to represent any empty cells, and '#' to represent any blocked cells. A word can be placed horizontally (left to right or right to left) or vertically (top to bottom or bottom to top) in the board if: Given a string word, return true if word can be placed in board, or false otherwise.
